### Contact Us

1. **City of Oak**  
   Point 100 Naylor Road  
   Oak Point, TX 75068
2. **Hours of Operation:**  
   Mon - Thurs 7:30 am - 5:30 pm  
   Fri 8:00 am - Noon
3. **City Hall Phone:**  
   [972-294-2312](tel:972-294-2312)
